descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b]
[/b][/size][/center][center][size=3][b]This is a "port" of my BodySlide preset from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/25705/?]Fallout 4[/url].
It has been adapted slightly for the Bodyslide version used fro skyrim so its not 100% like my Fallout version.
[/b][/size]
[b][size=3]There are two XML's in the folder a outfit version and a Body version build the body version for the body and the outfit for any outfits you want this preset to fit.

[/size][/b][size=5][b][u][color=Green]---Instalation---

[/color][/u][/b][/size][size=4][b]1:First locate your Skyrims directory mines is:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim

(it may differ if you have it installed on another drive or just elsewhere in general)
----
2:Now go in the "Data" folder and locate "CalienteTools" mine is located here:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools
----
3:now just drop the two XML files in the "Sliderpresets" folder mine is located here

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\CalienteTools\BodySlide\SliderPresets
----
4:Now just go into Bodyslide and do what you want with the preset

Their easy cheesy[/b][/size][/center]
author: DragonAir
